channel.title: Flash on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Flash on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Are your flash objects stealing your screen?
item.description: The past week here, in Dallas, has been the busiest so far. I have been working on a new navigation bar for Community Server Enterprise Reporting. I also have been making phone calls and getting everything in place for when school starts. In other news, Telligent is flying in all the remote employees. They should all be here by tonight, so tomorrow will be a really fun day; meeting all the Telligent employees.
